content: Note that which is now composed of nine markets generates results in US dollars, euros or relatively stable currencies, system-wide comparable sales grew 24.1% in the quarter driven mainly by guest volumes with specially strong results in Mexico and Panama. Just as an example, talking about delivery, we posted a quarterly sales record in the first quarter, and this includes not only that we increased sales by 29%, but we had the highest ever sales in a single month in March and on top of that record, we had in April, we set another monthly record.
